Text: thanks for all your uploads blackcanary. hey do you know if any of the groups release, or have ever released, the comic retailer magazine Internal Correspondence? i think it's published print & digital, with the digital copies being .pdfs. you can see covers here: http://comics.drivethrustuff.com/index.php?&manufacturers_id=5265

STFmaryville, you're welcome.  I did some searching and couldn't find Internal Correspondence.  It is published three times a year.  Issue #79 was published 7/25/2012, #80 was published on 10/23/2012, and #81 was published 3/27/2013.

thanks for your help blackcanary.

years and years ago the owner of my town's LCS would give me his copies of IC -- back then it was published by (now-defunct) capital city distribution, i think. it was a great read, especially compared to wizard magazine, because it taught me about sales trends and advertising co-ops... basically the business side of our hobby.

well, if you ever see any copies floating around, i'd be grateful if you could share them. i would buy a copy, but i can't justify paying $10 for one!
